content:
From: Lex Bailey <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
Yes, we are moving to Isabelle 2022 generally, but some of us are still
using 2021.
Eventually we won't need the 2021version at all (hopefully).

Similarly I'm sure we will move to the 2023 release when that happens, but
for now we need to be able to make releases of the versions we use now, for
teaching.

Thanks.
